MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G2 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Garnet Street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.30am. Our engineers have arrived at Sauchiehall Street substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.33pm on Tuesday 16th February 2021.
